Is there a property to rotate Heritrix logs? I use 
Heritrix-3.1.1-20100928-SNAPSHOT. I tried to do it manually by logrotate 
with /etc/logrotate.d/heritrix_crawl:

/usr/local/heritrix/jobs/my-job/logs/*.log {
rotate 100
size=1000M
compress
create 644 webcrawl webcrawl
}

but it didn't work well. Heritrix didn't write in the new crawl.log file 
after compressing the first 1G. I didn't know why, did you?

Anyway, I want to rotate the logs from heritrix not by logrotate as it 
will be very compatible.

Thanks in advance.
